testcase.name: Verify Inactive Campaign List
testcase.system-out: Given the API endpoint authentication token.................................passed When I send a GET request to the API endpoint...............................passed Then the response status code should be 200.................................passed And the response body should contain a list of inactive campaigns...........passed And inactive campaigns starting date is 2015................................passed

testcase.name: User gets an authentication token
testcase.system-out: Given the user has valid credentials........................................passed When the user requests an authentication token..............................passed Then a valid token is returned..............................................passed
